q: as encouraging investment. The bitter campaign split Italy's powerful labour unions. Sergio Marchionne praised the "courage" of workers who gave their approval. Saying yes to flexibility makes it possible to achieve very high production levels, of up to 280,000 vehicles per year, and also open the way for the potential creation of jobs, Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. "In a country such as Italy, which has always been tied to the past and reluctant to change... those who voted yes showed vision," he said.

The software vendor said today that it has promoted its senior veep Satya Nadella to the position left vacant by Muglia. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Steve Ballmer . reported that Microsoft was set to undergo a radical reshuffle of its management team.
